text: Year of the Comet is a 1992 American romantic adventure comedy movie directed by Peter Yates and starring Tim Daly, Ian Richardson, Louis Jourdan, Penelope Ann Miller, Nick Brimble, Shane Rimmer, George Rossi. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1992 adventure movies Category:1992 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Yates Category:Movies set in Scotland Category:Movies about alcohol
title: Year of the Comet
